name: Game Jam Game Jam Game
description:
Created with the prompt of “time as a commodity” during the Jalloo 2017 Game Jam, The Game Jam Game Jam Game is a game about making a game during the Jalloo 2017 Game Jam.

Players must carefully allocate their available 24 hours across a delicate balance of caffeination and game production, lest they end up with something that’s really garbage the next day. In honor of Jalloo’s tenth anniversary, The Game Jam Game Jam Game includes memorable moments from past game jams and captures some familiar organizing faces, serving as a micro cultural time capsule for future generations of Jalloo jammers and players alike.

Explore the possible outcomes that can arise when you sink into the depravity of supersaturated 24 hour game development, and should your efforts succeed in making the best game jam game you can, you might just break reality and explore an alternate timeline with a slightly different, Jalloo.

Made by: Rebecca Goodine, Nicholas Polchies, Tyler Matchett, Jeff Mundee, Jade Yhap, and Chad Comeau .

With Special Guests: Brian McGee, Armand Cormier, and sometimes Lauren Cruikshank.
